edits.oldString:
* Design Elements:

edits.newString:
* Design Elements:
 * - Clean, rounded typography for modern professional appearance
 * - Monochrome dark text for clean, professional look
 * - Simple, readable text-only approach
 * - Responsive sizing for different contexts
